en: and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread.
And they give food in spite of love for it to the needy,
[Saying], "We feed you only for the face [i.e., approval] of Allah.

ar: لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَآءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
en: We wish not from you reward or gratitude.
Indeed, We fear from our Lord a Day
